title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8187-2.5 - Notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8187-2.5 - Notice of hearing

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements of section
8187-2.1
of this Part, notices of hearings shall be sent as required in section
816
of the Real Property Tax

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8187-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
